role.label: Aggregate Redeemed or Repurchased Price, Fiscal Year
Aggregate Redeemed or Repurchased Price, Prior Fiscal Year
role.terseLabel: Aggregate Redeemed or Repurchased, Prior FY

role.label: Amount of Securities Received
role.documentation: Amount of securities to be received by the registrant (or cancelled upon issuance of securities to be registered on the form)

role.label: Amount of Securities Registered
role.documentation: The amount of securities being registered.

role.label: Carry Forward Form Type
role.documentation: The Form Type of the prior shelf registration statement from which unsold securities are carried forward under 415(a)(6). This should be an EDGAR submission type (S-3, S-3/A, S-3ASR, etc.), which means there is a fixed set of possible responses. Note that while the XBRL response should be an EDGAR submission type, the human-readable Ex. 107 could include a simpler label (e.g., "Form S-3" in the human-readable and "S-3ASR" in the XBRL).

role.label: Carry Forward Previously Paid Fee
role.terseLabel: Filing Fee Previously Paid in Connection with Unsold Securities to be Carried Forward
role.documentation: The fee previously paid in connection with the securities being brought forward from the prior shelf registration statement on which unsold securities are carried forward under 415(a)(6).

role.label: Carry Forward Prior Effective Date
role.documentation: The initial effective date of the prior shelf registration statement from which unsold securities are carried forward under 415(a)(6).

role.label: Carry Forward File Number
role.documentation: The EDGAR File Number of the prior shelf registration statement from which unsold securities are carried forward under 415(a)(6). If the prior registration statement has a Securities Act File Number and an Investment Company Act File Number, the Securities Act File Number should be used.

role.label: Combined Prospectus Item [Axis]
role.documentation: A sequence number (1, 2, 3...) used to distinguish different references to earlier prospectuses on a single fee bearing submission.

role.label: Cash Paid by Registrant in Transaction
role.documentation: Amount of cash consideration paid by registrant in connection with the exchange or other transaction being registered (in a 457(f) calculation).

role.label: Cash Received by Registrant in Transaction
role.documentation: Amount of cash consideration received by registrant in connection with the exchange or other transaction being registered (in a 457(f) calculation).

role.label: Entity Central Index Key
role.documentation: A unique 10-digit SEC-issued value to identify entities that have filed disclosures with the SEC. It is commonly abbreviated as CIK.

role.label: Entity Registrant Name
role.documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

role.label: Fee Amount
role.documentation: Total amount of registration fee (amount due after offsets).

role.label: Fee Note Maximum Aggregate Offering Price
Fee Rate
role.documentation: The rate per dollar of fees that public companies and other issuers pay to register their securities with the Commission.

role.label: Fees, Other Rule [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is using a rule other than 457(a), 457(o), or 457(f) to calculate the registration fee due.

role.label: Issuer Business Address, State or Country Code
Maximum Aggregate Offering Price
role.documentation: The maximum aggregate offering price for the offering that is being registered.

role.label: Maximum Offering Price per Security
role.terseLabel: Proposed Maximum Offering Price per Unit
role.documentation: The maximum offering price per share/unit being registered.

role.label: Narrative Disclosure, Maximum Aggregate Offering Amount
Narrative Disclosure, Maximum Aggregate Offering Price
Offering [Axis]
role.documentation: A sequence number (1, 2, 3...) used to distinguish different security offerings on a single fee bearing submission.

role.label: Offering Security Title
role.documentation: The title of the class of securities being registered (for each class being registered).

role.label: Offering Security Type
role.documentation: Type of securities: "Asset-backed Securities", "ADRs/ADSs", "Debt", "Debt Convertible into Equity", "Equity", "Face Amount Certificates", "Limited Partnership Interests", "Mortgage Backed Securities", "Non-Convertible Debt", "Unallocated (Universal) Shelf", "Exchange Traded Vehicle Securities", "Other"

role.label: Offset [Axis]
role.documentation: A sequence number (1, 2, 3...) used to distinguish different offsets as applied to a fee bearing submission.

role.label: Offset Claim Initial Filing Date
role.documentation: The initial filing date of the earlier registration statement with which the earlier (offsetting) fee was paid for a claimed offset. If the offset fee was paid with an amendment, do not provide the amendment date under this element; instead, provide the date of the initial filing (i.e. the "parent" filing) .

role.label: Offset Claimed Amount
role.documentation: The amount of offsetting fees being claimed.

role.label: Offset Prior Fee Amount
role.terseLabel: Fee Paid with Fee Offset Source
role.documentation: The fee prevoiusly paid from which an offset is being derived.

role.label: Offset Prior File Number
role.documentation: The EDGAR File Number of the earlier registration statement with which the earlier (offsetting) fee was paid. If the offset filing for the offset has a Securities Act File Number and an Investment Company Act File Number, the Securities Act File Number should be used.

role.label: Offset Prior Filer Name
role.documentation: The name of the registrant that filed the earlier registration statement with which the earlier (offsetting) fee was paid.

role.label: Offset Prior Form Type
role.documentation: The Form Type of the offset filing.

role.label: Offset Prior Unsold Number of Securities
role.terseLabel: Unsold Securities Associated with Fee Offset Claimed
role.documentation: The number of unsold securities registered on the prior registration statement that are associated with the claimed offset.

role.label: Offset Prior Security Title
role.terseLabel: Security Title Associated with Fee Offset Claimed
role.documentation: The title of the class of securities from which offset fees were derived.

role.label: Offset Prior Security Type
role.terseLabel: Security Type Associated with Fee Offset Claimed
role.documentation: Type of securities: "Asset-backed Securities", "ADRs/ADSs", "Debt", "Debt Convertible into Equity", "Equity", "Face Amount Certificates", "Limited Partnership Interests", "Mortgage Backed Securities", "Non-Convertible Debt", "Unallocated (Universal) Shelf", "Exchange Traded Vehicle Securities", "Other"

role.label: Offset Prior Unsold Offering Amount
role.terseLabel: Unsold Aggregate Offering Amount Associated with Fee Offset Claimed
role.documentation: The aggregate offering amount of unsold securities registered on the prior registration statement that are associated with the claimed offset.

role.label: Offset Source Filing Date
role.documentation: The filing date of the earlier registration statement with which the earlier (offsetting) fee was paid in an offset.

role.label: Rule 415(a)(6) [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is claiming a 415(a)(6) carryforward.

role.label: Rule 429 Aggregate Offering Amount
role.terseLabel: Maximum Aggregate Offering Price of Securities Previously Registered
role.documentation: The maximum aggregate offering amount of unsold securities registered on the prior registration statement that are carried forward under Rule 429. Only applicable if 457(o) was used in the fee calculation for the prior registration statement.

role.label: Rule 429 Combined Prospectus [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is using a combined prospectus under Rule 429.

role.label: Rule 429 Earlier File Number
role.documentation: The Securities Act File Number of the earlier effective registration statement(s) from which securities may be offered and sold using the combined prospectus pursuant to Rule 429.

role.label: Rule 429 Earlier Form Type
role.documentation: The Form Type of the earlier registration statement from which unsold securities are carried forward under Rule 429. This should be an EDGAR submission type (S-3, S-3/A, S-3ASR, etc.), which means there is a fixed set of possible responses. Note that while the XBRL response should be an EDGAR submission type, the human-readable Ex. 107 could include a simpler label (e.g., "Form S-3" in the human-readable and "S-3ASR" in the XBRL).

role.label: Rule 429 Initial Effective Date
role.documentation: The filing date of the earlier registration statement from which unsold securities are carried forward under Rule 429.

role.label: Rule 429 Number Of Unsold Securities
role.documentation: The number of securities registered on the prior registration statement that are carried forward under Rule 429.

role.label: Rule 457(a) [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is using Rule 457(a) to calculate the registration fee due.

role.label: Rule 457(b) Offset [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is claiming an offset under Rule 457(b) or 0-11(a)(2).

role.label: Rule 457(f) [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is using Rule 457(f) to calculate the registration fee due.

role.label: Rule 457(o) [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is using Rule 457(o) to calculate the registration fee due.

role.label: Rule 457(p) Offset [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is claiming an offset under Rule 457(p).

role.label: Rule 457(u) [Flag]
role.documentation: Checkbox indicating whether filer is using Rule 457(u) to calculate the registration fee due.

role.label: Value of Securities Received
role.documentation: Value of securities to be received by the registrant (or cancelled upon issuance of securities to be registered on the form)

role.label: Value of Securities Received, Per Share
role.terseLabel: Value of Securities Received, Per Share
role.documentation: Value per share of securities to be received by the registrant (or cancelled upon issuance of securities to be registered on the form). This is included in the explanation of 457(f) fee calculation.
